channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Culture Crossroads
channel.desc: RAMUNE, a descendant of Japanese emigrants to Brazil, is a performer of rakugo, Japan's traditional storytelling. Performing in multiple languages, she helps foreigners experience Japanese culture.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsroom Tokyo
channel.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: One In Every Japanese
channel.desc: 1 in 10 Japanese got married through online spouse-hunting services in 2020. We interview women who use matchmaking apps, including Manami, who uses multiple apps to find a perfect partner.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ukiyoe Edo Life: Summer Light Show
channel.desc: We venture to the outskirts of Edo just after sunset, where a group of women and children have come to a stream to enjoy a popular summer activity. What could they be looking for among the weeds.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Seasoning The Seasons
channel.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Medical Frontiers
channel.desc: Recent data show constipation can lead to life-threatening conditions like stroke and chronic kidney disease. We explore the risks of self-diagnosing and a new device for managing constipation.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Where We Call Home
channel.desc: People from around the globe who put down roots in Japan offer a glimpse into their lives and the hardships they face in Japanese society.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Activate Your Japanese!
channel.desc: Learn how to make the most of your Japanese skills. Watch our drama that features useful communication strategies, our snappy videos about onomatopoeia, and our documentaries on "senpai" in Japan.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Hello! Nhk World Japan
channel.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN holds regular disaster mitigation seminars for international students, providing the knowledge that foreign residents need to stay safe. We introduce a seminar at Kanazawa University.
